Before I send a fraudulent form to all the people that are requested, I just want to find out if it is a data error or why the R1 doesn’t exist in CJIS. There doesn’t seem to be any notes and it is not flagged. The person that it matches up to  was entered into Clear and there is no information in there either for him. When you have a chance, can you look into it? Thank you!  Shannan F. Barton Intelligence Analyst Commonwealth Fusion Center 470 Worcester Road Framingham, MA 01702 508-820-2233 shannan.barton@state.ma.us

I tried tracking down his identity through social media, but was unsuccessful there as well.   I’m sorry I was not able to provide you with more useful information. If you need anything further, please let me know.   Respectfully, Justin   Justin Salvatore Intelligence Analyst II Massachusetts State Police | Commonwealth Fusion Center 470 Worcester Road, Framingham, MA 01702 Phone: (508) 820-2233 justin.salvatore@pol.state.ma.us

subject: Discovery for Commonwealth v.   -   - Incident # 2019-134-0086
body: Good afternoon trooper,   I’ve been assigned the case against   (AKA  ) and I am reaching out regarding the discovery for this case. I wanted to ask if you could provide me with any and all of the material you collected as part of your investigation. In particular, I am wondering if you have any fingerprints, birth certificates, facial recognition, supplemental reports, and information on the defendant’s true name. Reading your report, it also appears that you were able to pull data from the Brockton and Taunton RMVs. Would you be able to provide that information as well?   I recall that I sent, or will send, you a summons for December 17, 2019 on another case. This case is on for a pretrial hearing tomorrow, so I will ask the court to put this on for the same date so you don’t have to come back here twice.   Best Andrew   Andrew S. Haag Legal Assistant Suffolk County District Attorney’s Office Boston Municipal Court – Central Division 24 New Chardon St Boston, MA 02114 Phone: 617-396-5785 Fax: 617-227-4731    potential match, but the R1 is no longer available. It may be due to the age of the record or it is possible the RMV transaction was never completed. The information for that final match is   DOB:   MA DL# S . Please let us know if you need anything further.   The result of a facial recognition search is provided by the CFC only as an investigative lead and IS NOT TO BE CONSIDERED A POSITIVE IDENTIFICATION OF ANY SUBJECT. Any possible connection or involvement of any subject to the investigation must be determined through further investigation.   If you believe that a Massachusetts Driver's License or other identification associated with an ongoing criminal investigation may be fraudulently obtained, please contact the Massachusetts State Police Fraud Identification Section directly - (857) 368-9500.     Respectfully, Justin   Justin Salvatore Intelligence Analyst II Massachusetts State Police | Commonwealth Fusion Center 470 Worcester Road, Framingham, MA 01702 Phone: (508) 820-2233 justin.salvatore@pol.state.ma.us

body: Lieutenant Christopher Boyle #2710 Massachusetts State Police Division of Homeland Security and Preparedness Fraud Identification Unit nd 10 Park Plaza, 2  Floor Boston, MA  02116 christopher.boyle@mass.gov cell: 781-738-7286    and got potential matches to MA DLs, with different names and DOBs than attached to the RI DLs.   I ran both RI DL numbers in CJIS, but one is listed as not on file and the other is associated to a different name and DOB. I then ran the names and DOBs on the licenses in CJIS and found individuals that match the information on the licenses (except for the DL number and Image).   It does not appear to be the typical fraud ID case, but they are using names, addresses, and DOBs of real Rhode Island residents. I figured I would pass the information along with the supporting documentation for further review.   Respectfully,   Shannan   Shannan F. Barton   Intelligence Analyst Commonwealth Fusion Center 470 Worcester Road Framingham, MA 01702 508-820-2233 shannan.barton@state.ma.us
